continueToSiteUserAgreement.message: By clicking on the "Continue to site" button, you understand that this site has been flagged and may harm your computer.

documentBlockedPageName.description: Title for the document blocked page

dontWarnAboutSite.message: Don't warn me about this site again

extShortDesc.description: this will be in the chrome web store: must be 132 characters or less
extShortDesc.message: Stay protected while searching and surfing the Web. Never worry about suspicious websites again.

malwareWarning.description: malware warning text for the document blocked page
malwareWarning.message: The URL or program you are trying to access appears to contain malware or exploits. Malware can harm your computer or otherwise operate without your consent. Just visiting a website that hosts malware may infect your computer.

securityWarning.description: security warning head for the document blocked page

securityWarningHarm.description: security warning text for the document blocked page
securityWarningHarm.message: Accessing this site or file may harm your computer.

trustWebsitePrompt.description: ask user if website is trusted for the document blocked page
trustWebsitePrompt.message: If you trust this website and don't want us to warn you again, add it to your safelist by checking the box below, then click the "CONTINUE TO SITE" button. Note that this action cannot be undone.
